name: senecio congestus
description: Marsh Fleabane, also called Swamp Ragwort or Swamp Groundsel,  is an annual, or sometimes biennial, commonly found in boreal regions. It can be found growing in a variety of wetlands and on the shores of streams and lakes. When in bloom, the plants reach up to 3 feet in height.  It is also classified as Tephroseris palustris.
